comment: After practice I'd go to Wendy's get fries and get a Frosty double
food: Wendy's fries and a Frosty double
name: Zooey Dash-in-hell

comment: I ate everything. Lol I gained 80 pounds with my first and 90 with my second. So "everything" is my answer.
name: Laura Kruger

comment: Some find it strange that I had no cravings when pregnant with my twins, I would be so hungry but nothing sounded good. Not even ........beer o_o I was a complete stranger to even myself....
food: I would be so hungry but nothing sounded good.
name: Hoppe Go Lucky

food: I craved chocolate milk, lemonade, kettle chips, and cheeseburgers most of all. And ice cream.
name: Ironcide

comment: Stopped at the store last night after practice to grab chocolate milk, because protein. I came out with chocolate milk, two kinds of cheese, and half a pound of smoked salmon. Because PROTEIN.
food: Stopped at the store last night after practice to grab chocolate milk... I came out with chocolate milk, two kinds of cheese, and half a pound of smoked salmon.
name: Critical Tits

food: After the idea of chocolate milk was put into my head, I went and picked up chocolate milk...and caramel popcorn...and greek yogurt...and ice cream....and grape soda - but I only drank the milk. Lol!
name: Zooey Dash-in-hell

food: I drank a gallon of OJ every day and I craved the Chicken Strip basket with texas toast, fries, and gravy from Dairy Queen.
name: Zooey Dash-in-hell

comment: When I was pregnant, every day I ate egg salad over a bed of spinach with a side of ice cream.
food: Every day I ate egg salad over a bed of spinach with a side of ice cream.
name: Slyanide

comment: After derby, I love to gorge on yogurt almonds. Or egg sandwiches with loads of sriracha.
food: Gorge on yogurt almonds. Or egg sandwiches with loads of sriracha.
name: Slyanide

food: MILK! I drank milk with every meal.
name: Megan McMahan

food: Gummy bears, Cocoa Krispies, and ketchup which I do not usually enjoy.
name: Camille Toad

food: A general need to devour everything that surrounds me.
name: HP Shovecraft

food: Beef jerky, trail mix, shitty cheese pizza, and sherbet.
name: Bettie Davis Thighs

food: Overcooked green beans, tuna melts, and curried anything.
name: CoffeeMugger

food: Chocolate milk, Guiness, prime rib, bacon, and pancakes.
name: Little Lebowski
